description: Get product information for recommended price

parameters.name: postfix_1
parameters.description: Postfix 1 to calculate post reputation by successful comments or unlocked

parameters.name: postfix_2
parameters.description: Will be filled if 5 minutes after the 1st posting. Result will be checked in 5 minutes

parameters.name: msg_id
parameters.description: Request msg identity to a row, using a identity post parameter to recommend price

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Optional parameter to control_id, get_profit_parameter, short_video_index, show_page_source

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Indicate error link first error. Display if the error exists

parameters.name: running
parameters.description: Indicate errors during first error. Display if the error happens

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error

notes: The documentation appears to be for a price recommendation API for short videos. Some parameters have Chinese language references in the original which have been translated. The API seems to handle both successful price recommendations and various error conditions.
